title: REO SPEEDWAGON font ID
content:
looking to get an id on the words “SPEED WAGON” in green. thanks,  
danny

comments.content: It looks hand drawn, but it was apparently based on [Windsor](http://web.archive.org/web/20080609103831/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=windsor).
